Introduction

Ko Shinwon is a South Korean singer and the sub-vocalist of PENTAGON under Cube Entertainment. Before pursuing a career as an idol, he worked as a model.

Shinwon debuted with PENTAGON on October 10, 2016, with their self-titled mini-album PENTAGON. On December 4, 2023, it was announced that he would be enlisting for mandatory military service on December 21. He is expected to be discharged on September 20, 2025.
